```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape)

# methodology: 
# evaluate_models.sh to get precision and recall metrics
# save them to file in ../data

precisions <- read.table('/home/anhvu/PycharmProjects/mycointrons/statistics/intron-performance-metrics/basidiomycota/gridsearch_intron_model_precision.txt')
recalls <- read.table('/home/anhvu/PycharmProjects/mycointrons/statistics/intron-performance-metrics/basidiomycota/gridsearch_intron_model_recall.txt')
performance <- data.frame(C = rep(c(3,4,5,6,7), each=5),
                          d = rep(c(3,4,5,6,7), times=5),
                          precision = precisions$V1,
                          recall = recalls$V1)

performance <- performance %>% 
  melt(measure.vars=c('precision', 'recall')) %>%
  mutate(C = as.factor(C)) %>%
  mutate(d = as.factor(d))

p1 <- performance %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = C, y = value)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  ggtitle("Intron model gridsearch results (C)") +
  facet_wrap(~variable) 

p2 <- performance %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = d, y = value)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  ggtitle("Intron model gridsearch results (d)") +
  facet_wrap(~variable) 

p1

p2
```
